summary: This document is a series of email exchanges on July 9, 2024, between attorneys at Wigdor LLP (Jeanne M. Christensen and Douglas Wigdor) and an external recipient regarding an urgent matter concerning Leon Black. The emails contain confidentiality notices and indicate the law firm is attempting to arrange a private call.

persons.name: Jeanne M. Christensen
persons.context: Attorney initiating and coordinating urgent communication regarding Leon Black. She is the primary sender in the email chain.

persons.name: Douglas Wigdor
persons.context: Attorney copied on the email chain regarding the urgent matter concerning Leon Black.

persons.name: Meredith Firetog
persons.context: External recipient being urgently contacted by Wigdor LLP attorneys regarding Leon Black. The emails request a call.

persons.name: Leon Black
persons.context: The individual who is the subject of the urgent legal communication between Wigdor LLP and an external recipient.

connections.description: Partners/attorneys at the same law firm (Wigdor LLP), collaborating on a matter concerning Leon Black.
Attorney (Christensen) is attempting to establish urgent contact with an external individual (Firetog) regarding Leon Black.
Attorney (Christensen) is involved in a legal matter concerning Leon Black, as indicated by the subject of the emails.
Attorney (Wigdor) is copied on urgent communications regarding a matter involving Leon Black.

events.title: Urgent Legal Communication Regarding Leon Black
events.description: Attorneys from Wigdor LLP engage in an email chain attempting to arrange an urgent private call with an external recipient (Meredith Firetog) concerning Leon Black.

keyFacts: On July 9, 2024, attorneys from the law firm Wigdor LLP were engaged in urgent communication regarding Leon Black.
The emails indicate the matter was confidential and potentially subject to attorney-client privilege.
The communication shows an attempt to arrange a private call between Wigdor LLP and an external individual, Meredith Firetog.
Leon Black is the central subject of this urgent legal correspondence.
